page.title: 03CLUBS IN CURDWORTH
page.content: TENNIS CLUB FOUNDED 1938 6 TOURNAMENTS A YEAR. BIRMINGHAM METROPOLITAN AND LADIES WARWICKSHIRE LEAGUE TEAMS. WIDOWS AND PENSIONERS FUND STARTED 1971 BY 5 PATRONS OF WHITE HORSE CURDWORTH RAISE MONEY FOR CHRISTMAS TREATS. SENIOR CITIZENS, SOCIAL SERVICES LUNCHEON CLUB, RUN BY VOLUNTEERS, TWICE WEEKLY, A HOT LUNCH AND BINGO SESSION. MOTHERS AND TODDLERS CLUB, CHILDREN MEET, CHAT AND SHARE IDEAS. CURDWORTH W.I. FIRST FOUNDED 1929 LASTED ONE YEAR. REFORMED IN 1949 NOW HAS LIVELY MEETINGS WITH ABOUT 30 MEMBERS. CURDWORTH SENIOR CITIZENS FORMED IN 1972 WELL ATTENDED HAS MANY INTERESTING OUTINGS AND EVENTS. WOMENS GUILD FOUNDED 1962 WORKS HARD TO KEEP CURDWORTH CHURCH BEAUTIFUL SPEAKERS OUTINGS AND FUND RAISING EVENTS ARE GOOD. THERE IS A CUB,BROWNIE AND GUIDE PACK.
